title: Upgraded3x2 Apartment! with new carpet, vinyl and granite countertop
posting_body: ['Welcome to City Place ApartmentsWelcome to City Place on the Westside of Las', 'Vegas, located near the I-15 and minutes from the Strip!', 'Conveniently near major retail centers, everything you need is only a few minutes away.', 'We offer a tranquil', 'community with great spacious floorplans from 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Units, and our', 'best-selling 2 Bed, 1.5 Bath Townhomes.', 'Get comfortable in your new large', 'apartment home with our new upgraded flooring, brushed nickel fixtures, stainless-steel appliances, walk-in closets, and private patios.', 'Discover a new standard of living when you become a', 'resident at our community.', 'Call today and schedule your tour.', '-Carport', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Pool', '-Night Patrol', '-Air Conditioner', '-Fitness Center', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Window Coverings', '-Business Center', '-Playground', '-Laundry Facilities', '-On-Site Management', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
